description: This Dart source file is a Flutter application implementing a Memory Match game. It includes main app setup, game logic, UI components for game board, timer, score, and interactive cards.

classes.name: MemoryGameApp
classes.description: Root widget configuring global theme and setting home to the game screen.

classes.name: MemoryGameScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget managing game state, user interactions, timer, and rendering the game board.

classes.name: MemoryCard
classes.description: Data model representing individual memory game cards.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the MemoryGameApp.

methods.name: _buildColorScheme
methods.description: Creates and returns a ColorScheme for the app's theme.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MemoryGameApp, returns MaterialApp with theme and home screen.

methods.name: _buildDeck
methods.description: Generates and shuffles the deck of memory cards.

methods.name: _startTimerIfNeeded
methods.description: Starts the game timer if it isn't already running.

methods.name: _resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state, optionally with a specific number of pairs.

methods.name: _onCardTap
methods.description: Handles user tapping a card; manages game logic for matching and flipping.

methods.name: _restartWithCurrentLayout
methods.description: Restarts the game with a grid layout based on current UI size.
